Articles.Content:
We don't have this yet? Initiative, people!

I'm optimistic about 2015. New video games, new Star Wars movies, new KSP development phase. Given how much 2014 sucked, I figure that the cycle has to start again with a good year. Besides, any year with KSP in it is a good year in my book.

Anyone have resolutions?
Fellow Kerbonauts, Citizens and Commanders - Happy New Year!
Here's to a way less sucky 2015! *lifts glass of tea*
And another good year for EA and Microsoft to gobble up innocent developers.

On the first day of Kristmas my Co-Pilot gave to me...

A capsule on a Redstone.
It's 23:32 here. 30 minutes left...

Almost time in the UK

There are people swearing on the BBC five mins before the fireworks!!!????
Happy 2015

Happy 2015

Happy new years from the UK

Sorry, but having seen more than few new years all I can say is...

plus ÃƒÂ§a change, plus c'est la mÃƒÂªme chose

Happy 2015. I have an interesting story with a firework...

Some people shot a firework even though it had a damaged fin, and they knew that. I got very lucky. Thank you overhang.

Edited January 1, 2015 by DMSP
A bunch of brain dead fools fired a box of fireworks at a nearby house. They could have burned/blinded themselves while setting the wooden balcony on fire.
So to all our fellow Kerbanauts in the UK, Australia, New Zealand, how's 2015 so far? Anything the rest of us on the US East Coast should know about?

Happy 2015. I have an interesting story with a firework...

Do tell! I have time.

I don't do the resolution thing, I just sort of let those come to me organically.

Anyway, I wish good health and good fortune to every one of you in the new year.
Alright. Everyone have a good MMXV!
You know... having been playing ksp I now wonder how much dV my fireworks have... Happy new year!

You know... having been playing ksp I now wonder how much dV my fireworks have... Happy new year!

Orbital craft with fireworks any one?

Happy New Year.

My best wishes to Squad for making KSP great and the hopes that 2015 will bring KSP to another level of gameplay and innovation. Wishes also of a great year to the wonderful community of modders that make my KSP even more fun and cool.

And to all of you that fly over here, my best wishes of a great 2015.

Bydysawd industries and the SUR wishes everyone a happy new year for 2015. I wish people luck in new projects, Squad making new stuff bringing joy to people, and I wish people luck when they meet obstacles.
Happy New Years all you crazy people.
And hapy new year to all of you on Eastern Time!
1 hour to go here! Canada, Alberta
Also about an hour left in British Columbia, Canadia!
Happy 2015 from Alberta!
